basicInfo.name: Platin
basicInfo.flavor: Due to the high priest's sudden death during the war, Platin became high priest at a young age. As he came into his own as a high priest with powerful magic, the temple was destroyed and the world collapsed.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 50% of Magic Attack plus 60% of Defense 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict All Attack Reduction. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 65% of Magic Attack plus 75% of Defense.
 - Increases Effect: All Attack Reduction to 9%.

Skill 1.name: Otherworldly Light
Skill 1.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 42% of Magic Attack plus 47% of Defense 2 time(s).
 - Self
 - Heals HP equal to 32% of damage dealt.
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 50% of Magic Attack plus 55% of Defense.
 - Increases Effect: HP Recovery amount becomes 43% of Damage.

Skill 2.name: Apostle's Judgment
Skill 2.desc:
2 Enemies (By Highest No. of Buffs)
 - 100% chance to inflict 2 Buff Removal(s).
 - 25% HP Alteration
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: HP Alteration to 25%.

Passive.name: Nestra's Blessing
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Heals HP equal to 165% of the caster's Defense when HP falls to 50% or lower. [2 Time(s) per Battle]
 - All Enemies
 - Deals 1100 Fixed damage 1 time(s) upon being hit by an enemy's attack 4 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Healing: HP Recovery amount becomes 190% of Defense.
超越2段階達成効果
 - Increases Stacks: Heals HP more times per battle. [3 Time(s) per Battle]
超越6段階達成効果
 - Increases Damage: To 1485 Fixed damage.

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Pallanus, fruits, vegetables, wine, cats, order, acts of kindness, peace, reading, studying religion, walks, fishing
profile.dislikes: Noise, troublemakers, processed food, black magic
profile.story: Due to the high priest's sudden death during the war, Platin became high priest at a young age. As he came into his own as a high priest with powerful magic, the temple was destroyed and the world collapsed.

basicInfo.name: Platin
basicInfo.flavor: Platin was named successor to the high priest by recommendation of the high priest himself. He brought Branze and Bransel to the temple and took good care of them after they fell from the heavens.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 45% of Magic Attack plus 55% of Defense 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict All Attack Reduction. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 45% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Damage: To 55% of Magic Attack.

Skill 1.name: Otherworldly Light
Skill 1.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 37% of Magic Attack plus 42% of Defense 2 time(s).
 - Self
 - Heals HP equal to 28% of damage dealt.
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 37% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Damage: To 42% of Magic Attack.

Skill 2.name: Apostle's Judgment
Skill 2.desc:
2 Enemies (By Highest No. of Buffs)
 - 100% chance to inflict 2 Buff Removal(s).
 - 42% HP Alteration

Passive.name: Nestra's Blessing
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Heals HP equal to 150% of the caster's Defense when HP falls to 50% or lower. [2 Time(s) per Battle]
 - All Enemies
 - Deals 775 Fixed damage 1 time(s) upon being hit by an enemy's attack 4 time(s).

profile.story: Platin was named successor to the high priest by recommendation of the high priest himself. He brought Branze and Bransel to the temple and took good care of them after they fell from the heavens.

basicInfo.name: Platin
basicInfo.flavor: Though Platin is from a lauded noble family, he spent most of his childhood days at the temple. With his ability to borrow power from the goddess and his noble blood, he was favored by the high priest.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 40% of Magic Attack plus 50% of Defense 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict All Attack Reduction. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 40% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Damage: To 50% of Magic Attack.

Skill 1.name: Otherworldly Light
Skill 1.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 35% of Magic Attack plus 40% of Defense 2 time(s).
 - Self
 - Heals HP equal to 24% of damage dealt.
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 35% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Damage: To 40% of Magic Attack.

Skill 2.name: Apostle's Judgment
Skill 2.desc:
2 Enemies (By Highest No. of Buffs)
 - 100% chance to inflict 1 Buff Removal(s).
 - 55% HP Alteration

Passive.name: Nestra's Blessing
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Heals HP equal to 135% of the caster's Defense when HP falls to 50% or lower. [2 Time(s) per Battle]
 - All Enemies
 - Deals 510 Fixed damage 1 time(s) upon being hit by an enemy's attack 4 time(s).
